entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning except zero inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning except zero inland. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
